keywords: convenience@add jacket potato for a complete meal
convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: A delicious meatless goulash.

method.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan and cook onion until softened. Add chickpeas, paprika and caraway seeds cook for 1 min.
Stir in tomatoes, tomato puree, green pepper and mushrooms. Bring to boil. Cover and simmer for 30 min, stirring occasionally. Add a little stock or water if becoming too dry.
Top with a swirl of fresh soured cream before serving.

title: Chickpea goulash
